## tidb-ctl schema tid

Schema Information of Tables By TableID

### Synopsis

'tidb-ctl schema tid --id(-i) [tableID]' to get schema info of a specified table id.

```
tidb-ctl schema tid [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help     help for tid
  -i, --id int   get schema info of a specified table id.
```
